title: Forgotten Soul

properties.name: description
properties.value: Forgotten Souls are monsters found in the Crumbling Tower on the Isle of Souls. Their stats and drop table are similar to those of Chaos druids, although they have more hitpoints and are classified as ghosts, making them weak to the effects of the salve amulet.

content:
This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page
For the monster in Soul Wars, see Forgotten Soul (Soul Wars).

Forgotten Souls are monsters found in the Crumbling Tower on the Isle of Souls. Their stats and drop table are similar to those of Chaos druids, although they have more hitpoints and are classified as ghosts, making them weak to the effects of the salve amulet.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Prayer info
  • 3 Drops

    • 3.2 Herbs
    • 3.3 Runes and ammunition
    • 3.4 Coins

    • 3.6 Gem drop table

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 84,736 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Forgotten Soul kill is worth 933.41.
